did.unittitle: Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection
did.abstract: This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The 1905-1906 Abraham & Straus catalog was the gift of Harry Seeback, 1978, and was transferred to this collection from the Brooklyn Historical Society ephemera collection (ARC.272) in 1987. The remaining items were the gift of Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr., 1986.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in three folders. The E.W. Bliss catalog is housed in its own folder, the three Abraham & Straus catalogs are in another, and the remaining items are in the third.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection, 1986.047, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
